Package com.tokelon.toktales.desktop.lwjgl.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IWindowContextFactory
    Creates window context instances and window context builders, as well as factories for window context properties.
    IWindowContextFactory.IWindowContextIconSetterFactory
    Creates a window icon setter for a window context.
    IWindowContextFactory.IWindowContextInputDriverFactory
    Creates an input driver for a window context.
    IWindowContextFactory.IWindowContextRendererFactory
    Creates a window renderer for a window context.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultGameWindowRenderer
    Default implementation of IWindowRenderer for the engine, that calls render on the engine driver.
    GameWindowRenderer
    Implementation of IWindowRenderer for the engine, that calls render on the engine driver.
    LWJGLWindow
    LWJGL implementation of IWindow.
    LWJGLWindowContext
    LWJGL implementation of IWindowContext.
    LWJGLWindowContextBuilder
    LWJGL implementation of IWindowContextBuilder.
    LWJGLWindowContextFactory
    LWJGL implementation of IWindowContextFactory.
    LWJGLWindowContextFactory.LWJGLWindowContextIconSetterFactory
    LWJGL implementation of IWindowContextIconSetterFactory.
    LWJGLWindowContextFactory.LWJGLWindowContextInputDriverFactory
    LWJGL implementation of IWindowContextInputDriverFactory.
    LWJGLWindowContextFactory.LWJGLWindowContextRendererFactory
    LWJGL implementation of IWindowContextRendererFactory.
    LWJGLWindowFactory
    LWJGL implementation of IWindowFactory.
    LWJGLWindowRenderer
    LWJGL implementation of IWindowRenderer.
    LWJGLWindowToolkit
    LWJGL implementation of IWindowToolkit.
